original_text: So Zimri destroyed the whole family of Baasha, in accordance with the word of the Lord spoken against Baasha through the prophet Jehu—
korean_text: 바아사의 온 집을 멸하였는데 선지자 예후를 통하여 바아사를 꾸짖어 하신 여호와의 말씀 같이 되었으니

sentences.original_text: So Zimri destroyed the whole family of Baasha
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 시므리가 바아사의 온 가족을 멸망시켰다

sentences.original_text: in accordance with the word of the Lord
